Package shirmin

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • shirmin.Parser
  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a parser for interpreting user input and file data into Tasks.

    This class is responsible for parsing strings into corresponding Task objects like Todo, Deadline, and Event, and handles parsing of date strings as well.

      Parser()
      Initializes a new Parser instance.

    • Method Detail

      • parseTask

        public Task parseTask​(java.lang.String line)
        Parses a string into a Task object.

        The method interprets a string representation of a task (e.g., from a saved file) and converts it into a corresponding Task object. The task could be of types Todo, Deadline, or Event. It also handles marking tasks as done if indicated in the input.

        Parameters:
        line - The string representation of the task to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The parsed Task object, or null if the parsing fails or the task type is unknown.

      • parseDateString

        public java.lang.String parseDateString​(java.lang.String dateString)
                                 throws java.time.format.DateTimeParseException
        Parses a date string into a formatted date string.

        Attempts to parse a given date string according to a predefined format ("MMM dd yyyy HH:mm") and converts it into a different format ("yyyy-MM-dd HHmm"). If parsing fails, an error message is displayed through the UI component.

        Parameters:
        dateString - The date string to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The formatted date string, or null if parsing fails.
        Throws:
        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException - if the date string does not match the expected format.

      • formatTaskForFile

        public java.lang.String formatTaskForFile​(Task task)
        Formats a Task object into a string representation suitable for file storage.

        The format includes the task type, its completion status, and its description. For Deadline and Event tasks, their respective dates are also included.

        Parameters:
        task - The Task object to be formatted.
        Returns:
        The formatted string representation of the task.
